ValidationRule.description: The impact and probability field needs to be populated when the project item type is Risks or Issues.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(PF_Type__c, 'Risk'), ISPICKVAL(PF_Type__c, 'Issue')), OR( ISPICKVAL(PF_Impact__c , ""), ISPICKVAL(PF_Probability__c, "") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Project Item Type is Risk or Issue, then Impact and Probability field cannot be blank.
